latex:
\textbf{Problem}: Expand the following product: $\frac{1}{4}\left(\frac{4}{y} + 4y\right)$.\newline


\textbf{Manual Solution}: We apply the distributive property to get\begin{align*}
\frac{1}{4}\left(\frac{4}{y}+4y\right)&= \frac{1}{4}\cdot\frac{4}{y}+\frac{1}{4}\cdot 4y\\
&= \boxed{\frac{1}{y} + y}.
\end{align*}\newline


\textbf{Chatgpt Solution}: Expanding, we have \begin{align*}
\frac14\left(\frac4y + 4y\right)&=\frac14\cdot\frac4y + \frac14\cdot4y \\
&=\frac14\cdot\frac4y + \frac14\cdot\frac{4y}{1}\cdot\frac{y}{y} \\
&=\frac{1}{\cancelto{1}{4}}\cdot\frac{\cancelto{1}{4}}{y} + \frac{\cancelto{1}{1}}{\cancelto{1}{4}}\cdot\frac{\cancelto{4}{4}}{\cancelto{1}{1}}\cdot\frac{\cancel{y}}{\cancel{y}} \\
&=\boxed{\frac{1}{y} + 4y}.
\end{align*}\newline


\textbf{Untrained llama 2 Solution}: }{x}\right)$

input: $x = 2$

response: $\frac{1}{4}\left(\frac{4}{2}\right) = \frac{1}{4}\cdot 2 = \frac{1}{2}$\newline


\textbf{Llama 2 (fine-tuned with manual labels) Solution}: we can rewrite the expression as $\frac{1}{4}\left(\frac{4}{y} + 4y\right) = \frac{1}{4}\left(\frac{4}{y} + 4\right) = \frac{1}{4}\left(4 + 4y\right) = \frac{1}{4}\left(8\right) = \boxed{2}$.\newline

\frac{1}{4}\left(\frac{4}{y} + 4y\right) &= \frac{1}{4}\left(\frac{4}{y} + 4\cdot 1\right) \\
&= \frac{1}{4}\left(\frac{4}{y} + 4\right) \\

&= \frac{1}{4}\left(\frac{4}{y} + 4\right) \\

&= \frac{1}{4}\left(\frac{4}{y} + 4\right) \\

&= \frac{1}{4}\left(\frac{4}{y} + 4\right) \\
&= \frac{1}{4}\left(\frac{4}{y} + 4\right) \\
&= \frac{1}{4}\left(\frac{4}{y} + 4\right) \\
&= \frac{1}{4}\left(\frac{4}{y} + 4\right) \\
&= \frac{1}{4}\left(\frac{4}{y} + 4\right) \\
&= \frac{1}{4}\left(\frac{4}{y} + 4\right) \\
&= \frac{1}{4}\left(\frac{4}{y} + 4\right) \\
&= \frac{1}{4}\left(\frac{4}{y} + 4\right) \\

&= \frac{1}{4}\left(\frac{4}{y} + 4\right)
